What Is RSS, and How Do I Use It?
12 March 2008
RSS stands for "Really Simple Syndication", and it allows you to subscribe to blogs and news sites you like so you'll be able to read them whenever they get updated, without having to go check the site to see if there's anything new. You do this using an RSS reader, which can either be a web site type reader or software that you install on your computer. Read more...
